name: Endless Nungeon
description:
Controls
  • WASD/ARROWS - Move
  • SPACE/ LEFT-CLICK - Attack
  • MOUSE - Aim Projectiles
  • COLLECT PowerUps

Make Careful Sacrifices

Change Log v1.2 [02-12-2018]
  • Fixed player max health not resetting properly causing occasional death from full HP bar
v1.1 [05-12-2018]
  • Fixed enemy stats not resetting, causing permanent scaling when retrying
  • Fixed projectiles not behaving as intended (speed and collisions not being read properly)
  • Fixed retry button on final victory not accepting clicks
Submission for Ludum Dare 43 Created by Haustgeirr (Code), Limnori (Art), Baleoce (Sound)

A game about making difficult choices. You play a maiden of the cloth sent to destroy the pagan hordes. Collect power ups, and use them to stop the pagan cultists getting theirs. It makes sense.
